caseTitle: Peshawar Electric Supply Company Ltd v. Wafaqi Mohtasib (Ombudsman), Islamabad & others
tagline: The appointment and or recruitment in a public sector company like Peshawar Electric Supply Company Ltd is an executive function and such function cannot be performed by the Wafaqi Mohtasib under Article 9 of the Establishment of the Office of Wafaqi Mohtasib Order 1983 which excludes his jurisdiction to entertain a complaint of the nature. If, ex facie, the Ombudsman is not conferred with such a power, and the order of the nature is passed by it, the High Court can always in exercise of its constitutional jurisdiction rectify such error.
